actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to make 60 years the required minimum age for the receipt of certain spouse's benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to reduce the minimum age for the receipt of spouse's benefits under such Act from 65 to 60.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to make 60 years the required minimum age for the receipt of certain spouse's benefits.
